actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Coast Guard and Maritime Transportation.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Coast Guard and Maritime Transportation

official_title: To amend title 46, United States Code, to allow Port Infrastructure Development Program grants to support the loading and unloading of commercially harvested fish and fish products, and for other purposes.
short_title: Supporting Commercial Fishing in Port Infrastructure Projects Act

summary.text:
Supporting Commercial Fishing in Port Infrastructure Projects Act

This bill modifies the Maritime Administration's (MARAD's) Port Infrastructure Development Program to allow MARAD to award grants for port infrastructure development projects that support the loading and unloading of commercially harvested fish and fish products.

titles.title: Supporting Commercial Fishing in Port Infrastructure Projects Act
Supporting Commercial Fishing in Port Infrastructure Projects Act

To amend title 46, United States Code, to allow Port Infrastructure Development Program grants to support the loading and unloading of commercially harvested fish and fish products, and for other purposes.
